reviews.subject: Data Structures
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson provides clear explanations and the projects are very relevant to real-world scenarios. Highly recommend!

reviews.subject: Operating Systems
reviews.review: The course is tough but rewarding. Dr. Lee is knowledgeable but sometimes moves too quickly through material.

reviews.subject: Artificial Intelligence
reviews.review: Great professor with lots of experience in AI. The workload is heavy but the knowledge gained is worth it.

reviews.subject: Database Systems
reviews.review: Dr. Wilson is a good instructor, but the lectures can be a bit dry. The projects are interesting, though.

reviews.subject: Discrete Mathematics
reviews.review: Dr. Davis is amazing! She makes difficult concepts easy to understand and is always willing to help students.

reviews.subject: Computer Networks
reviews.review: Solid course with a lot of practical information. Dr. Miller is approachable and explains the material well.

reviews.subject: Software Engineering
reviews.review: The course is well-organized, but Dr. Martinez's lectures can be a bit monotonous at times.

reviews.subject: Machine Learning
reviews.review: Dr. Clark is one of the best professors I've had. His passion for the subject is contagious.

reviews.subject: Human-Computer Interaction
reviews.review: Very interactive and engaging course. Dr. Robinson makes sure everyone participates and understands the content.

reviews.subject: Computer Graphics
reviews.review: Dr. Walker is knowledgeable, but the course could use more hands-on assignments to reinforce the concepts.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Programming
reviews.review: Great for beginners. Dr. Scott explains everything thoroughly and is very patient with questions.

reviews.subject: Cybersecurity
reviews.review: One of the best courses I've taken. Dr. Hall is an expert in the field and the course material is highly relevant.

reviews.subject: Theory of Computation
reviews.review: The content is difficult, but Dr. Adams does her best to make it accessible. The exams are tough.

reviews.subject: Programming Languages
reviews.review: Dr. Baker's enthusiasm for the subject is evident. The course is well-structured and informative.

reviews.subject: Computer Architecture
reviews.review: Challenging but rewarding course. Dr. Gonzalez is very supportive and provides detailed feedback.

reviews.subject: Software Testing
reviews.review: Dr. Perez is knowledgeable, but the course could benefit from more practical examples and case studies.

reviews.subject: Operating Systems
reviews.review: Dr. Edwards is great at breaking down complex topics. The course workload is heavy but manageable.

reviews.subject: Algorithms
reviews.review: Dr. Harris is an exceptional teacher. His explanations are clear, and the problem sets are very challenging.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Computer Science
reviews.review: Dr. Thompson makes learning fun and engaging. The course is perfect for students new to computer science.

reviews.subject: Advanced Databases
reviews.review: Dr. King knows his stuff. The course is difficult, but he provides a lot of resources to help students succeed.
